data.eml:eml: New genera, species and records of Phaneropterinae (Orthoptera, Phaneropteridae) from sub-Saharan Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Massa, Bruno (2015): New genera, species and records of Phaneropterinae (Orthoptera, Phaneropteridae) from sub-Saharan Africa. ZooKeys 472: 77-102, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.472.8575, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.472.8575
